title: (cosplay) Sinful succulence Morgana
body:
https://i.imgur.com/lRbq3Qd.jpg

I made this about two years ago in the span of maybe a month. I regret everything that was the wings. I am not a professional and am entirely self taught. The most challenging part of this cosplay was actually making the top. I have never drafted a pattern of my own before this. 

cost of materials: 250USD
time: 3 weeks (off and on working)
comfort level: moderately comfortable without wings, very awkward to go in doors and up stairs with the wings
most troubling part to make: top part of the apron
favorite part: the pocket in the apron
most painful painful part: The prosthetic ears

after being worn three times. 
https://i.imgur.com/TkENAgv.jpg

replies.body:
As league's official Morgana lover I come to say very nice and good work. 

Did you make some burnt cookies/prop to go all the way?

+1.

Also yeah wings are what keep many people from cosplaying my beloved angels.

As a Morgana Main and lover, there was no way I was making this cosplay half assed. Although it was fairly easy for most parts of it ( there wasn't a lot of details like my Jhin cosplay was earlier this year). I really enjoyed this cosplay and want to remake the wings with a more stable harness base. 

And no, I didn't have the cookies, I had the tray, but the convention center wouldn't let me bring it in. Ironically though, I do bake a lot like Morgana.

I think you should give yourself more credit because this looks fantastic! You've never drafted a pattern but your top still came out so clean and the lace detailing on your skirt is a really nice touch! :) I hope you'll share more of your cosplay with us in the future!

Wow thank you. I actually have posted my Jhin cosplay I made earlier this year a few months ago which I feel is a lot better due to having more time to work on it. It didn't get noticed that much here like this one. I am really flattered by the amount of positive comments this has gotten motivating me to work harder on the next one. Thank you for having faith in me and motivating me to keep working.

Always love seeing love for the bae.
{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-rainbows}} {{sticker:sg-jinx}} {{sticker:sg-lux}}

The dress is great, the wings look too healthy. 
Morganas wings are damaged, hurt. Remember, she is a fallen Angel. The look like someone ripped most of the feathers out of them.

I am aware that the wings look off. The wings where a last minute thing I made since the supplies I needed to make the tattered ones where not available when I made this. So I had to make due with what I had and went a route I was comfortable with rather then trying something new that could have been a failure and cost me more time then it should have. If I had more time to work on this cosplay ( like two days a week for a month) I probably would have done better on the wings.  I did say in the main post I wanted to remake the wings. And for the reason you said-They don't match her design.

wow very cool!

(btw i am normally no big cosplay fan ^^)
Beautiful! My friends and I should try something like this.{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}
bro whats up the wings look sick asss!! good work {{sticker:katarina-love}}
